response.overview: A group of friends must band together to solve a haunting mystery from the past to help solve the mysterious occurrence of people disappearing. It takes a dark turn when they start to see dark shadows and silhouettes watching them. Are their minds playing tricks on them? Or is it something more real?  Will they solve the mystery and find out the reason behind everything? Or will they end up disappearing like everyone else?
response.title: The Visitors
